Package com.javagameengine.assets.material

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Material
    Material defines a material composed of Textures and Shaders that can be applied to Renderable objects and rendered in the rendering queue.
    Shader
    Compiles GLSL shader files into a representative object.
    ShaderVariable
    Describes a variable inside a GLSL shader.
    Texture
    A Texture object is a wrapper for a NIO buffer or array of NIO buffers containing data that can be sampled by the GPU.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Material.TextureType  
    Shader.Type  
    ShaderVariable.Dimension  
    ShaderVariable.Format  
    ShaderVariable.Type  
    Texture.MagFilter
    Magnification filter
    Texture.MinFilter
    Minification filter
    Texture.Mode
    Data storage mode
    Texture.Type
    Texture format
    Texture.WrapMode
    Texture wrapping mode
